name: Endless Soldier
description:
A soldier is called to a mission that only he can do. Confronted with loss, the soldier discovers that he is just a tiny piece on a large board - he decides to face his master and bring down the entire organization. Controls

Arrows (left and right) - Movement

Arrow (up) - Jump

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Middle Mouse Button - Pause

Right Mouse Button - Dash

This was the first game I made in Construct (I usually work in Unity) - I had a class in the Video Games course where the final project was to make a game in about 1 week in Construct. And so Endless Soldier was born - I took care of all the programming and game design and went online to get the art. It was also the first time I made a game without original art and it was really interesting to go back and forth on the Internet trying to find all the art I needed and still try to maintain an artistic and conceptual direction. Play a little bit and tell me what you think!

Check my first official lauch game here: https://www.mirai167game.com/
